duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct and supervise Patient Services staff in the processing of patients, scheduling of appointments, patient visits, and maintenance of records.
Supervise the processing of charges for clinic services, filing of insurance claims, responses to requests for information, and the maintenance of related information for the department.
Interview, hire, and train employees; plan, assign, and direct work; appraise performance; reward and discipline employees; address complaints and resolve problems.
Perform work according to established procedures; refer problems of an unusual nature to the supervisor.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent. A minimum of five (5) years of customer service experience of which two (2) years are in a supervisory role. Experience in a clinic or physician's office is preferred. OR At least three (3) years of experience at TTUHSC in the Patient Services Program, one (1) year of supervisory experience.
